download_message: Before exporting the PDF document, please ensure that all images on the pages have finished loading. Then, in the pop-up print dialog, select 'Printer - Save as PDF', and click the 'Save' button. To ensure that all content is displayed correctly, please check the 'Background graphics' option in the print dialog box and set the 'Margins' to 'None.'
share_link_tip: Copy the link to share with others.
share_embed_tip: After copying, please manually adjust the iframe width and height for optimal viewing.
need_password: This document requires a password to view
need_password_tip: Please enter the password and press Enter
need_password_error: Password verification failed, please try again
